casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gyrell Shavonta LEE 335PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 21, 2017 Paul M. Green, Assistant Appellant Defender, Durham, for Lee, Gyrell Shavonta. Kimberly D. Potter, Special Deputy Attorney General, Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Womble, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Camden R. Webb, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Ilya Shapiro, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for Cato Institute.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 19th of June 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of June 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 26th day of July 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
